nodes.text: Jarl Narvis was a male Human who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Jarl was married to Gille Narvis, and their daughter was Kalee Narvis. He and Gille owned the arms company Legal Arms Ltd., and Jarl was Captain of the company's ship, Aggressive Negotiation. During the Clone Wars, he flew it to the Cularin system to deliver some weapons for the Cularin Militia. However, it was attacked and boarded by a Thaereian military patrol and they killed Jarl.
